name: Twenty (Spidd)
description:
TWENTY

Simple Tower defense game made for Mini Jam 73 in Godot Engine.  

Your goal is to survive 20 waves of enemies. 

You can use turret to shoot, but turret needs to be powered by battery. You need to charge your battery as well.  Try to find best strategy to beat all waves and get the highest score. 

Controls

Move: WASD or Arrows

Open store: SPACE ( you need to be on top of the Upgrade machine and you need to put battery to the machine )

Pick up turret/ Battery ; drop Turret/ Battery ; Buy upgrades: E

Skip tutorial/ Skip to next wave: N

Gameplay

After tutorial, you need to pick turret and drop it near enemies. Than you should pick battery and drop it inside turret. The turret starts to shoot the enemies. When battery discharged, put it inside charger. When you have enough coins, put battery inside upgrade machine and buy upgrades. Repeat until you beat all 20 waves. 

Advice

The enemies will not attack you nor your turret, so do not worry about that.
